content:
The Commonpoint Challenge is a fundraiser where you choose your own activity to do between April 1 and April 21, 2023. All money raised supports the programs and services that help the community, such as food, mental health services, and employment support.

The top three fundraisers will receive prizes. To learn more and see challenge suggestions, go to CommonpointQueens.org/Challenge. Share your challenge stories and tag Commonpoint Queens using the hashtag #CommonpointChallenge.
